body_html:
@martinwicke I haven't figured out how to get tensorflow from source (especially with GPU). For one thing, there seems to be a bazel issue upstream. bazelbuild/bazel#1193

There was one issue that was fixed with the GPU using --genrule=standalone from #2053 though.

I looked over the tests, it is a bit strange that the CPU tests pass, but not the GPU tests. Perhaps you might know the reason for that and/or can help me fix it and test it quickly? I feel bad holding you guys up on this too.
